channel.title: Think Rethink Play Podcast

channel.itunes:subtitle: by Rethink Gaming
channel.itunes:author: Jerry Pirkle and Bob McDowell
channel.itunes:summary: Jerry, Bob, and the occasional guest discuss gaming topics.
channel.description: The RethinkGaming staff discuss gaming and pop culture topics. We're currently playing A lOT of Dungeons and Dragons, but anything gaming related is fair game. Join us on Patreon to get a shout out and let us know what you want to talk about!

item.title: Think Rethink Play Podcast | Ep 1 | How to Railroad Your Players in D&D
item.itunes:summary: Bob and Jerry discuss the topic of Agency in roleplaying games with stories, examples, and a little Q&A.
item.description: What is player agency? What is railroading? How do you balance telling the story that you want to tell with the actions of unpredictable demigod murder hobos?
item.itunes:author: Jerry Pirkle
